trans-unit.resname: This module does not have a slider to display products on the front office.
trans-unit.source: This module does not have a slider to display products on the front office.
trans-unit.target: This module does not have a slider to display products on the front office.

trans-unit.resname: If you set a product with countdown timer, but the product does not show up on the homepage, then you can use the "Special products slider" module to force it to show up.
trans-unit.source: If you set a product with countdown timer, but the product does not show up on the homepage, then you can use the "Special products slider" module to force it to show up.
trans-unit.target: If you set a product with countdown timer, but the product does not show up on the homepage, then you can use the "Special products slider" module to force it to show up.

trans-unit.resname: Each products slider module has an option to do not show the countdown timer.
trans-unit.source: Each products slider module has an option to do not show the countdown timer.
trans-unit.target: Each products slider module has an option to do not show the countdown timer.

trans-unit.resname: If you turn this option on, each special product will has a countdown timer.
trans-unit.source: If you turn this option on, each special product will has a countdown timer.
trans-unit.target: If you turn this option on, each special product will has a countdown timer.
